nodes.text: "Puffer Problems" is a comic strip written by Martin Fisher, drawn by Bob Molesworth and edited by Gunther Nickel. The story was published in the twenty-first issue of the Star Wars Rebels Magazine series by Egmont UK Ltd, which was released on September 21st, 2016, and was later republished in Volume 19, Number 1 of the Australian magazine K-Zone in January, 2018.
According to Fisher, the story is set after the short story "Rebel Bluff."
